list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: rub (someone or something) hard so as to clean them, typically with a brush and water.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he had to scrub the floor

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an act of scrubbing something or someone.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: give the floor a good scrub

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a semiabrasive cosmetic lotion applied to the face or body in order to cleanse the skin.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: don't use facial scrubs if your skin is sensitive
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đừng sử dụng tẩy tế bào chết nếu da của bạn nhạy cảm

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Bill emerged from the delivery room in green scrubs
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bill xuất hiện từ phòng giao hàng trong chà xanh

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: vegetation consisting mainly of brushwood or stunted forest growth.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a desert plain dotted with scrub
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một đơn giản sa mạc rải rác với chà

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: denoting a shrubby or small form of a plant.
